1 Make sure value type in cheat engine is set to array of bytes
2 paste one of these values in to the value box the click First scan (if first scan doesn't show up click new scan)
3 now click on one of the results and press ctrl + a
4 then right click on the results and click edit value
5 now copy one of the values from here and paste it in to there and click ok

Settings:
